Today we're announcing the availability of the GRDI-AMR Publication Library or
GRAPL (pronounced "grapple").

The [**GRDI-AMR Publication Library**](https://grapl.grdi-amr.com/) or
[*GRAPL*](https://grapl.grdi-amr.com/) is a
[Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/) [Group Library](https://www.zotero.org/support/groups) 
created and maintained by Brennan Chapman ([@chapb](https://github.com/chapb)) to 
catalogue publications associated with the GRDI-AMR1 and GRDI-AMR2 projects.

Learn more [here](https://github.com/grdi-amr/publications).
